page.title: 04SARSON SCHOOL(CONTD)
page.content: There are three different years of children aged 11 to 14 at Sarson. There are 18 female and 7 male teachers and 460 girls and boys.Four years ago there were 935 pupils but a new school was built in Melton.If children are good at music they may join the band or string group.We have 7 tennis courts and a large playing field.We have many clubs like netball,hockey,football,rugby,chess,sc ience and French clubs.The main subjects are design(art,home economics,fabrics,wood/metalwork,compu ter studies,English,French,humanities(hist ory,geography,R.E.),maths,P.E.,music and science.Some 3rd year pupils take German.This page is about education.
